name: Peace Domain
description: Clerics of the Peace Domain forge bonds that protect and empower allies, sharing burdens and turning unity into miraculous defense.

1.name: Peace Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Emboldening Bond
1.description: You can form a magical bond among creatures, letting them add a bonus to certain rolls and supporting coordinated defense.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Balm of Peace
2.description: You move with divine grace, healing creatures you pass near during the movement.

6.name: Protective Bond
6.description: Bonded allies can take damage for each other using a reaction, sharing harm to keep the group standing.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: You add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

17.name: Expansive Bond
17.description: Your bonds extend farther and protect more effectively.
